Articles.Content:
This mod will add more realism to your gameplay, with adding more tanks with the correct fuel for a NTR, and a small, medium, and large NTR. If you didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know, NTRÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t run on liquidfuel and oxidizer, the run on a single liquid, normally Liquid hydrogen. This mod will add hydrogen tanks of all sizes, and a 0.5m, a 1m, and a 2m NTR, as you can see in the picture.

Parts;

-1 Toroidal tank

-1 0.5m tank

-3 1m tank

-4 2m tank

-1 0.5m NTR

-1 1m NTR

Future plans;

-New NTR models.

-Better tank textures.

-Large NTR.

-Other parts...

Spaceport download link;

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/better-ntrs/

Imgur album of parts;

http://imgur.com/a/DM3Bn#0

Change-Log;

V1.0

-Initial Release.

V1.1

-Removed Large NTR.

If any one wanted to help me with modelling and texturing that would be great. I am like a "rookie programer" who wanted to make a mod, and i have got no idea how to make the part models or properly texture.

If you would like to help just comment in the comments, and any suggestions/feedback, just comment in the comments.

Edited July 23, 2013 by Fitzy3
Do you have permission to use the big nerva from KSPX?

Do you have permission to use the big nerva from KSPX?

Oh thats were it's from. I just got a big folder on my desktop of random parts and thats were I found it.

Oh thats were it's from. I just got a big folder on my desktop of random parts and thats were I found it.

Make sure you ask the creator of that part for permission to use it, otherwise, your mod could actually be taken down.

Generally, modders will help you out, so it shouldn't be that big of an issue.

Prblem is Claira, the girl who made KSPX, has been hired by Squad. Her pack is closed distribution only, and the only person who got the permission to redistribute it is KasperVLD, but only to update the parts as game updates come. So I highly doubt you will have the right to redistribute that part.

I just got a big folder on my desktop of random parts and thats were I found it.

Got to wonder how that folder got on your desktop.

Prblem is Claira, the girl who made KSPX, has been hired by Squad. Her pack is closed distribution only, and the only person who got the permission to redistribute it is KasperVLD, but only to update the parts as game updates come. So I highly doubt you will have the right to redistribute that part.

He's also distributing modified Squad parts....

He's also distributing modified Squad parts....

That's not a problem, Squad parts are open sourced and free for everyone to use, the KSPX LV-NB is the real problem here.
Ok, I will take out the large (KSPX) NTR.
